strings.RRP_ITEM_INTROINSECT_PICKUP: Heal upon killing those who have hurt you
strings.RRP_ITEM_INTROINSECT_DESC: On getting hit, inflict the enemy with a debuff lasting {0} seconds and decreasing the base damage of the enemy by {1}%. Get health back after killing an enemy with the debuff based on a complicated formula based on the base damage of the enemy which increases healing on stack.
